titles.title: Improving Dependent Care Tax Assistance Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
9/24/2008--Introduced.
Improving Dependent Care Tax Assistance Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase to $7,500 the employee tax exclusion for employer-provided dependent care assistance.
